rich-swap-test.build: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release --features testnet && ic-wasm target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/rich_swap.wasm -o target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/rich_swap_test.wasm shrink && ic-wasm target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/rich_swap_test.wasm -o target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/rich_swap_test.wasm metadata candid:service -f swap.did -v public && ic-wasm target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/rich_swap_test.wasm -o target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/rich_swap_test.wasm metadata supported_certificate_versions -d "1,2" -v public
